Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video of the cloud formation was not from Hurricane Irma, as it was originally shot in Canada in 2011.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the cloud formation by describing it as resembling an ominous face.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide evidence or sources to back up the assertion that Hurricane Irma created the cloud formation.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the cloud formation was a result of Hurricane Irma without providing any evidence or logical reasoning.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the cloud formation was not related to Hurricane Irma but was a natural occurrence in Canada in 2011.
